oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John T. Wilder corresondence with Martha Wilder, 1862 January 18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from J. T. Wilder to his wife, Martha, regarding his recent bout with pneumonia and the overall poor health of Camp Wickliffe in Kentucky. He also notes the promotion of several family members and friends.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Pneumonia; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Health aspects
Anderson, George; Anderson, Jim; Hascall, Milo Smith, 1829-1904; Kersttetter, Ed; Stewart, Jack; Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
United States. Army. Indiana Infantry Regiment, 15th (1861-1865); United States. Army. Indiana Infantry Regiment, 17th (1861-1865)
